metadata.title: Tech Support Playbook Escalation
metadata.description: Demonstrate how the agent guides an on-call engineer through a high-priority outage.

steps.speaker: Alex (On-call)
steps.message: Nova, I'm joining the bridge. What's the state of the router incident?

steps.speaker: Nova (Agent)
steps.message: Welcome, Alex. Here's the live diagnostic summary from the affected site.

steps.speaker: Alex (On-call)
steps.message: Is the customer entitled to a proactive credit?

steps.speaker: Nova (Agent)
steps.message: Yes. Their contract triggers mitigation after the SLA breach shown below.

steps.speaker: Alex (On-call)
steps.message: Great, walk me through the stabilization plan so I can brief the customer.

steps.speaker: Nova (Agent)
steps.message: Here's the sequence we're recommending to restore service and follow up.
